descriptions: The student does not engage with peer feedback or make any revisions to their writing.
The student acknowledges peer feedback but does not implement any changes or additions to their writing.
The student attempts to respond to peer feedback but struggles to add relevant details or strengthen their writing.
The student incorporates some peer suggestions and adds a few details, but the impact on the overall writing is limited.
The student effectively responds to most peer feedback, incorporating relevant details and strengthening their writing in several areas.
The student skillfully integrates peer feedback, adding significant details and making substantial improvements to their writing, demonstrating a clear understanding of suggestions.
The student's writing lacks detail and is not strengthened in any way.
The student adds minimal details, but they do not effectively strengthen the writing.
The student attempts to add details, but they are often irrelevant or do not enhance the writing significantly.
The student adds some relevant details that strengthen certain aspects of the writing.
The student consistently adds relevant details that strengthen the writing in multiple areas.
The student masterfully adds details that significantly strengthen the writing, demonstrating a keen understanding of how to enhance their work.
The student disregards all suggestions and makes no changes based on feedback.
The student acknowledges suggestions but dismisses them without consideration.
The student attempts to incorporate suggestions but struggles to understand or implement them effectively.
The student implements some suggestions, but their impact on the writing is minimal.
The student carefully considers and implements many suggestions, resulting in noticeable improvements to the writing.
The student thoughtfully considers and skillfully implements suggestions, leading to substantial improvements and a refined piece of writing.
